titleStmt.title: Flovvres of Sion. By VVilliam Drummond of Hawthorne-denne. To which is adioyned his cypresse groue
titleStmt.author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by the heirs of Andro Hart],

notesStmt.note: "A cypresse groue" has separate divisional title; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
